rows.label: qev041312_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmph. While you will never succeed, I do admire
your singular dedication as you pursue the gold
nopopotamus card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0002
rows.name:
Enough! I give up! It's clear that the gold
nopopotamus card never existed in the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0003
rows.name:
I wash my hands of Miralife Cards! I'm out!
From now on, I will dedicate my life to capturing
one of every living Miran creature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0004
rows.name:
You there! Bring me some high-spec hunting gear—
or at the least some hunting tips—and I will reward
you with a silver xiphias card from my collection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0008
rows.name:
What's this? A Ma-non hunting kit? I have no idea
how to use it, but it certainly seems impressive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0009
rows.name: Now claim your reward—the rare silver xiphias card![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0010
rows.name: ...What? You seek the gold nopopotamus card?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hmph! You're wasting your time. I bought up more
than half the Miralife Cards in circulation and found
nary a one. It's a myth, I tell you! A legend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0012
rows.name:
And yet you still won't give up, eh? Heh heh.
Ignorance is a powerful thing indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0013
rows.name:
Then go! Continue to flail about in desperation!
Perhaps fortune will favor you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0014
rows.name: ...Holding out, eh? So be it. Off with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0018
rows.name:
Prone hunting prowess? Hmm, yes... 
They do have a feral wisdom we lack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0019
rows.name:
...That was very informative. In return, you may claim
my rare silver xiphias card![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0020
rows.name: ...What? You seek the gold nopopotamus card?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0021
rows.name:
Hmph! You're wasting your time. I bought up more
than half the Miralife Cards in circulation and found
nary a one. It's a myth, I tell you! A legend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0022
rows.name:
And yet you still won't give up, eh? Heh heh.
Ignorance is a powerful thing indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0023
rows.name:
Then go! Continue to flail about in desperation!
Perhaps fortune will favor you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_MSG0024
rows.name: ...Holding out, eh? So be it. Off with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041312_JNK0030
rows.name: Trade

rows.label: qev041312_SEL0031
rows.name:
Exchange Prone hunting prowess
for Wilbur's silver xiphias card.

rows.label: qev041312_JNK0040
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev041312_SEL0041
rows.name:
Hold off on trading with Wilbur
and look for someone else.
